overview: American photojournalist Marsh Conners is assigned to cover a cattle epidemic. Falling in love with research scientist Dr. Marie Avedon, Conners attempts to help her convince the Masai tribesmen to have their cattle inoculated, and to locate the source of the disease.
tagline: TWO MEN and a WOMAN... on a strange mission in a land aflame with ADVENTURE!
title: East of Kilimanjaro
